questions.question: Which of the following databases support read replicas?
choices: MariaDB
MySQL
PostgreSQL
All of the above

questions.question: Which of the following is true about a read replica? (Choose two.)
choices: It is a read-only instance of a primary database
It can only exist in the same region as the primary database, although it can be in a different availability zone
It is updated via asynchronous replication from the primary instance
It is updated via synchronous replication from the primary instance

questions.question: Which of the following statements is true?
choices: A Multi-AZ setup is aimed at fault tolerance, while a read replica setup is aimed at scalability
Both read replicas and Multi-AZ configurations are aimed at fault tolerance
A Multi-AZ setup is aimed at scalability, while a read replica setup is aimed at fault tolerance
Both read replicas and Multi-AZ configurations are aimed at scalability

questions.question: How many EC2 instances can be attached to a single EBS volume at one time?
choices: Unlimited

questions.question: You launch an EC2 instance that has two volumes attached: a root and an additional volume, both created with default settings. What happens to each volume when you terminate the instance?
choices: The root volume is deleted and the additional volume is preserved
Both volumes are deleted
Both volumes are preserved
The instance is unable to terminate until the root volume is deleted

questions.question: In which of the following situations would you recommend using a placement group?
choices: Your fleet of EC2 instances requires high disk IO
Your fleet of EC2 instances requires high network throughput across two availability zones
Your fleet of EC2 instances requires high network throughput within a single availability zone
Your fleet of EC2 instances requires high network throughput to S3 buckets

questions.question: Which of the following is a valid reason to use a cold HDD EBS volume?
choices: You need a performant solid-state drive
You are trying to choose the lowest-cost EBS volume possible
You are performing data warehousing using the volume
You need an inexpensive boot volume

questions.question: Which of the following is a valid reason to use a provisioned IOPS EBS volume? (Choose two.)
choices: You want a low-cost option for your EBS volume
You need to support a large MongoDB database workload
You need massive performance and throughput for your applications
You have applications that need a bootable environment but can fail from time to time and be re-created

questions.question: What engines does ElastiCache provide for caching? (Choose two.)
choices: Memcached
AWS-WebCache
Redis
GitCache

questions.question: Which of the following cannot be used as an EBS boot volume? (Choose two.)
choices: General SSD
Throughput-optimized HDD
Cold HDD
Magnetic

questions.question: How does CloudFront increase the security of content at the edge? (Choose two.)
choices: Required HTTPS at all edge locations
Integration with AWS WAF (if configured)
Automatic client keys encrypted with KMS
Automatic deployment of AWS Shield

questions.question: Choose the true statements about edge locations. (Choose two.)
choices: There are fewer edge locations than regions
There are more edge locations than regions
There are fewer edge locations than availability zones
There are more edge locations than availability zones

questions.question: How long is content cached at an edge location?
choices: 24 hours
12 hours
12 hours by default, but this value can be changed
24 hours by default, but this value can be changed

questions.question: Why would you set the expiration period to 0 on a CloudFront distribution?
choices: To expire all content on all existing edge locations
To ensure caching does not occur for maximum throughput
To reduce the chances of a DDoS attack on your edge locations
To ensure the most up-to-date content is served at all edge locations

questions.question: Which of the following immediately removes an object from all edge locations?
choices: Removing the object from all origin servers
Removing all CloudFront edge locations with the object cached
Removing the object using the invalidation API
Invalidating the CloudFront distribution

questions.question: Which of the following storage classes provides the fastest data retrieval speeds?
choices: S3
S3-IA
S3 One Zone-IA
They are all identical

questions.question: What is an ElastiCache shard?
choices: A collection of multiple nodes that make up a cluster
A collection of clusters in an ElastiCache distribution
A collection of edge locations in an ElastiCache distribution
A single node in a cluster

questions.question: Which of the following provides the fastest access to a customer dataset?
choices: S3 with Transfer Acceleration
Storage gateway – virtual tape library
Storage gateway – stored volume
S3 standard

questions.question: Which of the following can ElastiCache be used for? (Choose two.)
choices: Ephemeral storage
Long-term storage
Message Queue
Logging store

questions.question: Which of the following are valid routing policies for Route 53? (Choose two.)
choices: Simple routing
Fault recovery routing
Latency-based routing
Cached routing
